lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bulls introduced Vinny Del Negro as their head coach, ending a seven-week search in which they tried to lure Mike D’Antoni from the Phoenix Suns and discussed a return with Doug Collins. Instead, they wound up with someone who had never coached. Del Negro was the Suns’ assistant general manager this season.
